Name: pyat pree
Sentence: You are cruel, my friend. The Mother of Dragons is in the right. She must be reunited with her babies. I will help you, Khaleesi.

Name: pyat pree
Sentence: When I learned you were coming to our city, I made an arrangement with the King of Qarth. He procured them for me.

Name: pyat pree
Sentence: The Mother of Dragons will be with her babies. She will give them her love and they will thrive by her side, forever.

Name: pyat pree
Sentence: Where will you run to, Daenerys Stormborn? Your dragons wait for you in the House of the Undying. Come see them.

Name: pyat pree
Sentence: They want to be with you.

Name: pyat pree
Sentence: Do you want to be with them?

Name: pyat pree
Sentence: It is strongest in their presence.

Name: pyat pree
Sentence: And they are strongest in yours.

Name: pyat pree
Sentence: You will be with them, through winter, summer, winter again. Across a thousand, thousand seasons you will be with them.

Name: pyat pree
Sentence: And we will be with you until time comes to an end.

Name: pyat pree
Sentence: They will be waiting a long time.
